tha-ap473:0.3_0: Hearing this, Moliya, the senior monks,
tha-ap473:1.4_0: and he saw the world speedless.
tha-ap473:2.4_0: the undefiled ones who have crossed the flood.
tha-ap473:3.3_0: He is worthy of religious donation,
tha-ap473:3.4_0: and having compassion for the whole world,
tha-ap473:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap473:5.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
tha-ap473:5.2_0: rebirth into all states of existence is eradicated,
tha-ap473:7.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap473:7.2_0: and skeleton without flesh or blood,
tha-ap473:7.3_0: I have realized the six kinds of direct knowledge,
tha-ap473:8.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Nāḷiya.
tha-ap473:9.1_0: first judges of the senior monks.
